GeneDef.label: Foraging incapable
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are incapable of working with plants. The exact reason for this gene makes the carrier so careless with plants is unknown.

GeneDef.label: minor foraging instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively plant and harvest plants a little faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: foraging instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively plant and harvest plants faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: major foraging instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively plant and harvest plants a lot faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: extreme foraging instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively plant and harvest plants extremely fast compared to normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: super foraging instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively plant and harvest plants super fast compared to normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: hyper foraging instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively plant and harvest plants at unbelievable speeds compared to normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.
